title: Gazebo exiting on simulation machine in the cloud

content.raw:
I have had the simulator exit with the following error twice halfwaty through a driving task. 

Error [parser.cc:99] Unable to load file[/usr/share/gazebo-1.8/sdf/1.4/joint.sdf]
Error [SDF.cc:761] Missing element description for [axis]
[gazebo-2] process has finished cleanly
log file: /home/ubuntu/.ros/log/e3bd7f52-cfc4-11e2-9926-002590c0c2a8/gazebo-2*.log

We are using vrc_task_1.world.
content.html:
I have had the simulator exit with the following error twice halfwaty through a driving task.

Error [parser.cc:99] Unable to load file[/usr/share/gazebo-1.8/sdf/1.4/joint.sdf] Error [SDF.cc:761] Missing element description for [axis] [gazebo-2] process has finished cleanly log file: /home/ubuntu/.ros/log/e3bd7f52-cfc4-11e2-9926-002590c0c2a8/gazebo-2*.log

We are using vrc_task_1.world.
